title: 游戏崩溃求大神解决 急求！
author: 大葱之灵@
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error
A full error report has been saved to D:\胡迪聪\Minecraft\应元计划(游戏）第二弹\应元计划\Minecraft\新建文件夹\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-07-06_22.27.58-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(
